title: Contract: Talent Learning Co-Ordinator
text:
Vacancy Details

Contract Opportunity We are recruiting for a Talent and Learning Co-Ordinator for a leading investment company . An opportunity has arisen for an HR professional within Human Resources. The role provides operational support and has dual reporting to the Head: Learning & Development and Head: Talent & OD.

Candidate Requirements

Companies may expire jobs at their own discretion.

If you have not received a response within two weeks, your application was most likely unsuccessful.

Hot Job 63 people have applied for this job. 267 people have viewed this job.

× Send an email about this job to a friend or to yourself by completing the fields below.

Employer: Ultimate Searching Consulting T/A Strike Holdings
